titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 458, 98th Congress, to allow the Secretary of the Senate to fill staff vacancies occurring during the closing of the office of a Senator in the case of the death or resignation of such Senator.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/24/1987--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 458, 98th Congress, to allow the Secretary of the Senate to fill certain staff vacancies which occur during the closing of the office of a Senator in the case of the death or resignation of such Senator.
